name: National Computer Forensics Institute Facility Expansion Grant Program
objective: The objective is the expansion of the National Computer Forensics Institute's (NCFI) current facility at Hoover, Alabama.  This grant is for the creation of three 35-person classrooms, a 250-person auditorium, and 20 administrative offices for additional staffing.

authorizations.text: Consolidated Appropriation Act of 2023, Division F, Title II, 236, Provides $23,000,000.00 to remain availablae until expended as a grant for the expansion of existing National Computer Forensics Institute Facilities.
